solution_line_template: Mary will inflate a total of {mary_rate} balloons/minute x {total_time} minutes = <<{mary_rate}*{total_time}={mary_total_balloons}>>{mary_total_balloons} balloons
Jess will inflate a total of {jess_rate} balloons/minute x {total_time} minutes = <<{jess_rate}*{total_time}={jess_total_balloons}>>{jess_total_balloons} balloons

Christina will inflate a total of {christina_rate} balloons/minute x {christina_late_time} minutes = <<{christina_rate}*{christina_late_time}={christina_total_balloons}>>{christina_total_balloons} balloons

Combining all balloons, they made {mary_total_balloons} balloons + {jess_total_balloons} balloons + {christina_total_balloons} balloons = <<{mary_total_balloons}+{jess_total_balloons}+{christina_total_balloons}={total_balloons}>>{total_balloons} balloons
